channel.title: gamejam on Home
channel.description: Recent content in gamejam on Home

item.title: Godot Wild Jam 64
item.description: Godot Wild Jam 64 happened this past month, with the theme Illumination, and I decided to give it a go! This was my 3rd game jam attempt, although this would be my first submitted entry. It’s called CandleRun, and you can check it out here. Along with the main theme, the 3 option “wild card” themes were “white out/ freezing out”, “blood is fuel”, and “trash everywhere”. Design Process I originally planned on a completely different game.
